title: Failed Drug Laws - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/21/18
itunes:title: Failed Drug Laws - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/21/18
description:
George Noory and Orange County, California trial judge Jim Gray discuss the failures of the justice system with excessive penalties for minor drug offenses, and whether crime would decrease if all drugs were legalized.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
